name: AObmen
slogan: AObmen is an automation software for currency exchange opertions. Software got a certificate of National Bank of Ukraine.
description: I've created program for internal use in "Demetra Plus" company and it was successfully used in more than 40 kiosks during 2 years. AObmen created using Borland Pascal 7.0 and Turbo Vision library. It was my first commercial programming experience.
